name: Ultra X-Treme Dual Sonic Impulse
description:
ZQSD / Arrows to move, Space to change your ship or use your gamepad.

Blue ship damages red enemies and is invulnerable to blue enemies, and the opposite for the red ship

LowTee and LittleBigMonkey : Developers

Green Witch and Starboxx : Game Artists

Thank you to Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio for the music 'New beginnings"
